scripts.build: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run create-env && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.create-env: wget https://repo.anaconda.com/archive/Anaconda3-2022.05-Linux-x86_64.sh && echo 'yes' | bash Anaconda3-2022.05-Linux-x86_64.sh && conda env create -n myenv -f=environment.yml
